title: This Nonviolent Stuff'll Get You Killed: How Guns Made the Civil Rights Movement Possible
author: Charles E. Cobb Jr.
description: A ground‑level history showing how armed self‑defense and community protection supported nonviolent protest and advanced the civil rights movement.

title: This Is Why You're Broke
author: Unknown
description: A straight‑talking guide to fixing money leaks—budgeting, debt payoff, credit repair, and smarter spending habits to get back in control of your finances.

title: Tribe of Mentors: Short Life Advice from the Best in the World
author: Tim Ferriss
description: Tactical advice, routines, and career wisdom from world‑class performers—covering productivity, decision‑making, health, and entrepreneurship.

title: The Unfair Advantage: How You Already Have What It Takes to Succeed
author: Ash Ali and Hasan Kubba
description: Discover and leverage your unique assets—insights, networks, location, and background—to build a startup or career edge competitors can’t copy.

title: Way of the Wolf: Straight Line Selling
author: Jordan Belfort
description: The Straight Line System for sales—build rapport fast, control the conversation, handle objections, and close with certainty and ethics.

title: What to Say When You Talk to Yourself
author: Shad Helmstetter, Ph.D.
description: Change your self‑talk to rewire beliefs and habits—scripts and techniques to eliminate negative programming and build confidence.

title: You Were Born Rich
author: Bob Proctor
description: A prosperity classic that blends mindset, visualization, and action steps to unlock your potential and create wealth.

title: You Are a Badass at Making Money
author: Jen Sincero
description: A fun, no‑fluff guide to transforming your money mindset, breaking income blocks, and taking bold action to earn more.

title: Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future
author: Peter Thiel with Blake Masters
description: How to create valuable companies that go from zero to one—monopoly thinking, contrarian insights, and scalable innovation.
